title: Engine Watch Face
summary: Inspired by the Boat Engine control Wheel - the new incredible watch face!
description: In partnership with world famous Typeface and Graphic designer Igor Mustaev, we are happy to announce our third and most complicated model of &Watches watch face for Android Wear so far: Engine WatchfaceHave you ever wanted to be a sailor crossing endless sea surfaces? We have!=) Inspired by the Boat Engine control Wheel we took the watch face design to the next level.Day of the week, date, animated seconds arrow and much more you will find in this watch face. More complications will follow in future!Stay tuned for updates! Hope you like it! As we just started with our manufacture we will be more than happy to hear your feedback!
descriptionHTML:
In partnership with world famous Typeface and Graphic designer Igor Mustaev, we are happy to announce our third and most complicated model of &Watches watch face for Android Wear so far: Engine Watchface

Have you ever wanted to be a sailor crossing endless sea surfaces? We have!=) Inspired by the Boat Engine control Wheel we took the watch face design to the next level.

Day of the week, date, animated seconds arrow and much more you will find in this watch face. More complications will follow in future!

Stay tuned for updates! Hope you like it!

As we just started with our manufacture we will be more than happy to hear your feedback!
comments: Battery drain very bad Love the design but very sad need to uninstall it because it drained the battery very fast...
